scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf lib && mkdir dist && mkdir lib
scripts.build: npm run clean && pip install -r requirements-dev.txt && pip install -r requirements.txt -t ./dist && cp *.py ./dist/ && cd ./dist && find . -type f | egrep -v '\.json$' | xargs node ../../../../bin/zip.js lambda.zip && cd ..
scripts.install-python-deps: pip install -r requirements-dev.txt && pip install -r requirements.txt
